name: Kat and the Cats
description:
Help Kat in a very challenging and possibly rage inducing adventure through the city. Kat's looking for the cats all over the city. Use your sorcery and jump all around the city to find them. Kat can change the time of the day with their staff, use it wisely.

Some things only appear during daylight, and some others only at night.

Explore the city and get all the cats to bring them home!

This game was available for OperaGX since made for a Gamemaker Game Jam in short period of time. We did put a lot of effort on making the best game possible in that time and we really hope you enjoy it!

Controls

You can use a keyboard or a controller

Arrow keys or D-Pad to move

Z or Square on PS and X on Xbox- Change day/night and accept in the main menu

X or X on PS and A on Xbox - Jump

C or Circle on PS and B on Xbox - Attack

You can accept with X(PS) or A(XB) if you're using controller.

Attacking lowers your stamina (potion on the top left), you can absorb the sunlight to make it full again.
